document_data.name: Shadowdale Trail
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Shadowdale Trail''' was a road in the [[Dalelands]] that ran north and south out of [[Shadowdale (town)|Shadowdale]]. Followed north out of Shadowdale it dwindled away to open country and became little more than a trail when followed south from Shadowdale along the [[River Ashaba]] to [[Mistledale]]. 

Shadowdale Trail intersected with the [[North Ride]] in the heart of Shadowdale village.
